00037 #ifndef _INTERACT_POINT_HEADER_INCLUDED
00038 #define _INTERACT_POINT_HEADER_INCLUDED
00039 
00040 #include <dir_point.H>
00041 #include <defs.H>
00042 #include <map>
00043 
00044 namespace SimSite3D{
00045 
00047   class interact_point_t : public dir_point_t{
00048   public:
00049     interact_point_t(alloc_t a = ALLOC_POSITION) : dir_point_t(a)
00050     {
00051       act_type = UNKNOWN_INTERACTION;
00052       // problem with iterators is cannot initialize atom to anything 
00053       // safe/usefull
00054     }
00055 
00056     interact_point_t(const interact_point_t& p) : dir_point_t(p)
00057     {
00058       do_copy(p); 
00059     }
00060 
00061     const interact_point_t& 
00062     operator=(const interact_point_t& p)
00063     {   
00064       if(&p != this){
00065         do_copy(p);
00066         dir_point_t::operator= (p);
00067       }
00068       return *this;
00069     }
00070 
00071     ~interact_point_t() { ; }
00072 
00073     static bool
00074     cmp(const interact_point_t &A, const interact_point_t &B)
00075     { return A.act_type < B.act_type; }
00076 
00077     interactionType act_type; 
00078   private:
00079     void
00080     do_copy(const interact_point_t& p)
00081     {
00082       act_type = p.act_type;
00083     }
00084   };
00085 
00086   typedef struct{
00087     chain_const_iter chain;
00088     residue_vci residue;
00089     atom_vci atom;
00090   }interact_atom_t;
00091   typedef std::vector<interact_atom_t> interact_atoms_vec;
00092   typedef interact_atoms_vec::const_iterator interact_atoms_vci;
00093 
00094 }
00095 
00096 #endif
